name: 蔡子萱
objective:
The course covers fundamental concepts of chemical kinetics in batch reactors or ideal flow reactors. Several learning goals are listed as follows: understanding rate laws and the kinetic parameters, determining kinetic parameters and mechanisms from kinetic data, understanding the effects of catalysts, mass transfer and heat transfer on kinetics. In addition, Students in class will learn about ideal reactor design and kinetic analysis by Matlab or Polymath and COMSOL Multiphysics .
* 課程討論化學動力學知識，應用程式 (Matlab or Polymath and COMSOL Multiphysics) 解題。
schedule:
W1： Overview of chemical kinetics
W2-3： Kinetics of homogeneous reaction
W4-5： Data about converting from A into P 
W6-7： Data about converting from A+B into P
W8-9： Multiple reactions
W10：Temperature and pressure effects 
W11-12：Heterogeneous reaction
W13-14：Catalytic reaction and adsorption 
W15-16：Solid-fluid reaction
W17-18：Flow reactor and its design

Bring your own laptop to join this class (no need to use it in the first class).
本課程需自備筆記型電腦 (第一堂不需要使用)。
scorePolicy:
講義成績 (Performance of completing lecture)  50%
程式撰寫 (MATLAB or polymath programs (March, April))  25%
軟體操作 (COMSOL Multiphysics (May))  20%
其他 Others  5%
* 以上為暫定，實際會依同學學習情況進行調整。

Most assignments are done during class, so make sure that you can focus on the lesson. (* 多數作業都是課程中完成，請務必確定能專心於課程中。)
materials:
Fogler, H. S., “Essentials of Chemical Reaction Engineering,” 2nd ed., Prentice Hall, New Jersey, 2017.
Levenspiel, O., “Chemical Reaction Engineering,” 3rd ed., John Wiley and Sons, Inc., New York, 1999.
